ELECTRO CONTROL SYSTEMS  PVT LTD. (Presently 
working) Senior Electrical Engineer -INCHARGE    ANJANEYULU.N   
MOBILE: +919177012142 ,7829796925  
E-Mail: anjaneyulu.ny @gmail.com  
In quest of career enhancing opportunities in the field of:  
  ~Project  Management  &Operation  ~ Erection  & Installation  ~ Project  Planning   
 
 
PROFESSIONAL OVERVIEW  
 B.Tech (EEE)  with 5 years of valuable experience in Erection, operation of Solar Power Plant.  
 Scope of excellence entails:  
 Presently Associated with ELECTRO COTROL SYSTEMS  PVT LTD.  
 
 
CORE COMPETENCE  
 Supervising project activities.  
 Support finalizing requirements and specifications in consultation with Engineering Consultants/ 
external suppliers, contractors & clients.  
 Working out various requirements with respect  to  utilities,  machines,  manpower  &  monitoring 
overall operations for ensuring timely  completion.  
 Deploying suitable manpower and equipment / material and ensuring proper planning to assure 
timely execut ion of the projects.  
 Anchoring on-site erection  &  installation activities  and ensuring completion  of  assignment  within 
the time & cost parameters and effective resource utilization to maximize the output.  
 Managing a team and guiding site staff mem bers to address and resolve performance bottlenecks.  
 Exposure in planning & execution of modernization and installation / commissioning of electrical 
equipment for Solar Plants.  
 
CAREER RECITAL  
 
Job Profile: Erection of 145  MW solar power plant  
 Working on 145 MW solar plant at SEDAM, KARNATAKA. (CLIENT: 
CLEANMAX ENVIRO GREEN ENERGY PVT LTD ) 
My role:  
 To look after the DC works . 
 Coordinating the AC works in MCR.  
 Worked as Electrical testing witnesse.  IKM SOLAR  PVT LTD  
Senior Electrical Engineer  
SRI BALAJI SOLAR ENERGIES PVT  LIMITED  
Electrical Engineer   
Job Profile: Erection &Operation and Maintenance  of MW scale plants  
 Completed 37MW solar plant at SIRICILLA, TELENGANA.  
My role:  
 To look after the DC works & AC works.  
 Coordinating the daily activities with the contractors available in the site.  
 Following the specified Engineering approved drawings.  
 Making suitable changes in the drawings as per the site  conditions and getting the work done by 
the approval from Design  team.  
 Ensuring the daily output from t he vendors and their teams by continuous monitoring and 
follow -ups.  
 Coordinating with the store about the availability of the material and making necessary  
informing activities to make sure the material reach the site in time.  
 Informing the Daily Progress Report to my Manager and planning for the n ecessary activities for 
the next day.  
 Coordinating with QUALITY department and getting the works closed as per the Quality  
standards.  
 Ensuring the safety of labour and safety of the material by following the rules furnished by the 
Safety and Admin  department.  
 Taking necessary actions by discussing with my management team to meet the targets like  
commissioning dates and Handovers.  
 
Job Profile: Erection of MW scale solar plants.  
 
 Completed 1.5MW solar plant at Nellore Narayana College.  
 Executed DC work 18MW solar power plant at Mahaboobnagar, Telangana.  
 Completed 20MW solar plant at Nizamabad, Telangana.  
 Done both DC and AC cabling works.  
 Wiring module to module and to string combiner box and to Inverter.  
 Coordinating with the clients about the day to day works.  
 
 
 
 Successfully  completed  EPC  of MW  Scale  PV Solar  Power  Plant  projects.  
 Done many projects in INDIAN RAILWAYS from 1KW scale to 500KW.  
 Done some commercial KW scale projects of different sizes in and around Hyderabad.  
 Worked as an electrical engineer for 2MW solar power plant at Medak.  
 Successfully installed a 400KW rooftop solar plant in Vizayanagaram.  
 Completed both DC and AC works at Mahaboobnagar 5MW.  
 
ACADEMIC CREDENTIALS  
 B.Tech. (Electrical Engineering ) from MOTHER TERESSA COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING&TECH, 
JNTUH (Apr 2013) with fris t class(6 3%).  
 Intermedi ate from Padma sri junior college, Guntur. (65 %) 
 SSC from VivekaVardhini High School, Sircilla. (66 %) 
 
 
  
 ACME CLEANTECH SOLUTIONS  
Senior Electrical Engineer -Operation and Maintenance  COMPUTER EXPOSURE
